io

Class DatabaseConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.DatabaseConnection

  • public class DatabaseConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to communicate with the database. It's also responsible for storing files locally, if there is e.g. no connection to the database available.
    Author:
    Ben Kohr, Lovis Heindrich

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseConnection()

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addAllIntoQueue(java.util.LinkedList<DatabaseEntry> entries)
      Puts all entries from a given list into this class's waiting queue.
      static void addIntoQueue(DatabaseEntry entry)
      Puts a single entry in the waiting queue for being written into the database.
      static void createDatabase()
      Creates gsat database structure consisting of four tables: genes, sequences, mutations, researcher.
      static void flushQueue()
      Empties the current waiting queue.
      static boolean gsatExists()
      checks if the given database already has the necessary tables for storing data database name must be 'gsat' and table names must be ‘genes‘, ‘sequences‘, ‘mutations‘
      static void insertAllIntoDatabase()
      Inserts all currently stored entries into the specified database.
      void resetDatabaseConnection() 
      static java.util.LinkedList<Gene> retrieveAllGenes()
      Retrieves all genes from the database and returns them.

    • Method Detail

      • addAllIntoQueue

        public static void addAllIntoQueue(java.util.LinkedList<DatabaseEntry> entries)
        Puts all entries from a given list into this class's waiting queue.
        Parameters:
        entries - A list of entries to be stored

      • addIntoQueue

        public static void addIntoQueue(DatabaseEntry entry)
        Puts a single entry in the waiting queue for being written into the database.
        Parameters:
        entry - New Data point to be written into the database

      • flushQueue

        public static void flushQueue()
        Empties the current waiting queue.

      • insertAllIntoDatabase

        public static void insertAllIntoDatabase()
                                  throws DatabaseConnectionException,
                                         DatabaseErrorException
        Inserts all currently stored entries into the specified database.
        Throws:
        DatabaseConnectionException
        DatabaseErrorException
        See Also:
        #insertIntoDatabase()

      • retrieveAllGenes

        public static java.util.LinkedList<Gene> retrieveAllGenes()
                                                   throws DatabaseConnectionException,
                                                          DatabaseErrorException
        Retrieves all genes from the database and returns them.
        Returns:
        List of genes currently stored in the database
        Throws:
        DatabaseConnectionException
        DatabaseErrorException

      • createDatabase

        public static void createDatabase()
        Creates gsat database structure consisting of four tables: genes, sequences, mutations, researcher. Names must not be changed. If a database called gsat already exists it will be dropped.

      • gsatExists

        public static boolean gsatExists()
        checks if the given database already has the necessary tables for storing data database name must be 'gsat' and table names must be ‘genes‘, ‘sequences‘, ‘mutations‘
        Returns:
        true if database exists, false if it does not exist

      • setDatabaseConnection

        public static void setDatabaseConnection(java.lang.String user,
                                         java.lang.String pass,
                                         int port,
                                         java.lang.String server)
        sets the values of the mysql database to be used and initializes the database
        Parameters:
        user - mysql user name
        pass - mysql password
        port - mysql server port
        server - mysql server address

      • resetDatabaseConnection

        public void resetDatabaseConnection()
